bibl.title: "Kilns" of the Ptolemaic Period at Tell Atrib. - Appendix: Malgorzata DASZKIEWICZ and Jerzy RAABE, Firing Temperatures of "Kiln" Walls from Tell Atrib.
Hellenistic and Roman Pottery in the Eastern Mediterranean - Advances in Scientific Studies. Acts of the II Nieborów Pottery Workshop, Nieborów, 18-20 December 1993
bibl.author: SCHOLL, Tomasz

bibl.note: The function of the "kilns" is open to discussion. - For more extensive account of research on these structures, see: EtTrav 17 (1994) pp. 5-18 and 285-313 (forthcoming).
